title: The difficult choices: Managing chronic pain while avoiding opioid abuse

title_detail.value: The difficult choices: Managing chronic pain while avoiding opioid abuse

summary: Rather than being considered a miracle pill that magically takes away pain, prescription opioids are increasingly being seen as a precursor to heroin addiction and the cause of potentially deadly overdoses themselves.

summary_detail.value: Rather than being considered a miracle pill that magically takes away pain, prescription opioids are increasingly being seen as a precursor to heroin addiction and the cause of potentially deadly overdoses themselves.
